article.title: Lockheed Awarded F-22 Software Funds
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Corporation, Forth Worth, Texas, is being awarded a $7,668,445 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract modification for F-22 software maintenance based on root cause analysis. Work will be performed at Marietta, Georgia. The Aeronautical Systems Center, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, is the contracting activity.
